text: Yordi Teijsse (born 19 July 1992) is a Dutch professional footballer who currently plays as a forward for AFC. He has previously played for Pancratius, Ter Leede, Quick Boys, Dundee, Wuppertaler SV and Quick Boys. While playing at Quick Boys, he earned the Player of the Season award from the club. Teijsse signed for Scottish Premiership club Dundee in May 2016. He made some appearances early in the 2016/17 season, but fell out of favour after October. He moved on loan to German club Wuppertaler SV in January 2017. His twin brother, Kenny Teijsse, is also a professional footballer. ==References== ==External links== * *Yordi Teijsse at FuPa.net * Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:Dutch footballers Category:Footballers from Amsterdam Category:Quick Boys players Category:Dundee F.C. players Category:Dutch expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Scotland Category:Dutch expatriate sportspeople in Scotland Category:Scottish Professional Football League players Category:Association football forwards Category:Wuppertaler SV players Category:Expatriate footballers in Germany Category:Dutch expatriate sportspeople in Germany Category:Ter Leede players
title: Yordi Teijsse
